VERSION 3.23.0.64

; force full screen refresh before locking to ensure
; the last open document does not ghostly remain on the screen

AFFECT [[4993744395179368692]]
    TRAVERSE [[7711468349764991]]#[[6504254477]] > [[14427530104363229979]] > [[214591687532]]#[[214629637004]]
        LOCATE AFTER [[7083172477658]]
        INSERT {
            ~&233748328658231&~: ~&214625660372&~

            ~&214604601930&~ {
                ~&5972374&~: refreshScreen
                ~&7713147298280334&~: 50
                ~&233743626668842&~: ~&6504329801&~
                ~&7083121289162&~: ~&214625660372&~
                ~&495358363329399331&~: { ~&214629637004&~.~&233748328658231&~ = ~&6504329801&~; }
            }
        }
    END TRAVERSE
END AFFECT
